captions.text: - What do you wanna do tonight?
We could watch a movie, or we can do it.
- Leave me alone, I like popcorn.

- There's not gonna be any
left for the rest of the movie.
- Why are we gonna watch this
if you're not gonna pay attention?

- No, I'm just, I can
do two things at once.
- You want me to pause this?

If you say don't pause it, it
means you can't ask questions.
That is that man, right there.

He had that show, where he was
married to a bunch of ladies.

- That's Bill Paxton, you're
talking about "Big Love."

We're just about to find
out who the killer is.
I'm watching this for the first time, too.
- Yeah, but it doesn't make any s--
- I literally have as much information
as you do right now, so...

- But if that's his sister,
then I don't get what--
- It'll be a discovery when we find out.

- I'm gonna punch you if you
keep being so patronizing.
Did you just fart on me?

title: Weird Things Couples Do On Movie Night

comments.text:
I feel so much better now that I know my Husband and I are not the only 
Couple that does these things and more HAHAHA....I ESPECIALLY CAN RELATE TO 
ARGUING WITH MY GUY ON THE NAMES OF ACTORS AND WHAT MOVIES THEY HAD BEEN 
IN.....I HAVE BEEN A MOVIE AND T.V. JUNKY MY WHOLE LIFE.....I COULDN'T 
WATCH CABLE BECAUSE OF WHERE WE LIVED,SO I WOULD RENT AND BUY ALOT OF 
MOVIES, WE HAD 5OO OR SO VHS TAPES I HAVE SEEN PRINCESS BRIDE,BACK TO THE 
FUTURE THE WHOLE SET,GHOST BUSTERS,ROMANCING THE STONE 1 AND 2,...CROCODILE 
DUNDEE AND A WHOLE PLETHORA OF OTHER MOVIES....I WOULD ALSO G0 TO THE 
LIBRARY THAT HAD MOVIES THAT WERE FORSYTHE MOST PART WAY OUT OF DATE.....I 
DIDNT MIND THOUGH MARILYN MONROE, JOHN WAYNE,AUDREY HEPBURN.....I SEE IT AS 
A POSITIVE THING NOT HAVING CABLE FOR THE FIRST 18 YEARS OF MY LIFE....I 
BELIEVE IT HELPED ME TO BECOME MORE VERSATILE I EVEN WATCHED FOREIGN MOVIES 
WITH SUBTITLES.....I AM SORRY I HAVE AN ISSUE WITH TRAILING OFF ON 
DIFFERENT SUBJECTS......I HAD A MAIN POINT,AND THAT IS; I AM WAY MORE 
KNOWLEDGEABLE THEN MY HUSBAND IS....CONSIDERING I AM RIGHT EVERYTIME....I 
AM A CHAMP.....HE SPENT MORE TIME PLAYING VIDEO GAMES IN HIS CHILDHOOD AND 
EVEN NOW.....IN THAT ASPECT HE KNOWS MORE THEN ME,HE IS A NATURAL ARTIST OF 
VIDEO GAMES.....
I REALIZE NEITHER OF THOSE TWO ARENT EXACTLY SOMETHING TO BRAG ABOUT BUT 
THEN AGAIN EVEN IF ITS SOMETHING TRIVIAL,AS it IS ﻿
